title: Immediate Action Items for Bazarr Parity Sprint
body:
## Immediate Actions Required

### Week 1 Tasks (Start immediately)

#### Backend Team
1. **Whisper Integration Scaffold**
   - Set up Docker client in `pkg/transcriber/`
   - Create container management interface
   - Add configuration schema

2. **Language Profile Schema**
   - Design database tables
   - Create migration scripts
   - Implement CRUD operations

3. **Scoring System Foundation**
   - Define scoring algorithm
   - Create score calculation service
   - Add database fields

#### Frontend Team
1. **Manual Search UI**
   - Create search component
   - Add provider selection
   - Implement result table

2. **Language Profile UI**
   - Profile management page
   - Media assignment interface
   - Migration wizard

#### DevOps Team
1. **Testing Infrastructure**
   - Set up integration test environment
   - Configure coverage reporting
   - Add performance benchmarks

2. **Caching Setup**
   - Evaluate Redis vs in-memory
   - Design cache key structure
   - Implement cache wrapper

### Daily Standup Topics
- Blockers and dependencies
- API contract agreements
- Testing requirements
- Documentation needs

### Week 1 Deliverables
- [ ] Whisper integration design doc
- [ ] Language profile API spec
- [ ] Manual search UI mockups
- [ ] Scoring algorithm proposal
- [ ] Test plan document

### Success Criteria
- All scaffolding in place
- No breaking changes to existing features
- Clear path forward for Week 2
- Team alignment on implementation

## Resources
- Bazarr source: https://github.com/morpheus65535/bazarr
- OpenAPI spec template in `docs/api/`
- UI component library in Storybook

## Communication
- Daily standups at 9 AM
- Slack channel: #subtitle-manager-dev
- Weekly demo on Fridays
